title: El Tigre Vestido Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Beer/Wine, Latin, Costa Rican, Ice cream, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A gourmet restaurant and bar located in the hills of Santa Barbara de Heredia. Has vegan options. Coffee beans grown by restaurant. Serves Latin fusion cuisine using organic ingredients. Offers a daily vegetarian special and at times is vegan. Made-in-house ice cream is available. Eco-friendly. Meeting rooms available. Wi-fi. Concierge parking.
streetAddress: 800 meters north of Cafe Britt Distribution Center, Santa Barbara
